name: The Legend of Chronos
description:
Influenced heavily by Zelda 1, The Legend of Chronos mixes classic adventure with the roguelike formula. Delve through one level of a dungeon, collect items, fight enemies, and vanquish the evil within. If you die, Chronos, the “Sword of Time”, will bring you back in time to fight again.

This is a proof of concept that mixes Zelda 1 style dungeons and roguelike perma-death. More work may continue on the project in the future.
